text: English majors understand human nature better than economists do.
author: Jane Smiley

text: Close elections tend to break toward the challenger because undecided voters - having held out so long against the incumbent - are by nature looking for change.
author: Ron Fournier

text: Is human nature basically good or evil? No economist can embark upon his profession without considering this question, and yet they all seem to. And they all seem to think human nature is basically good, or they wouldn't be surprised by the effects of deregulation.
author: Jane Smiley

text: People have always wanted to be recognized, and that's human nature. But people used to want to be recognized for their accomplishments, and now they simply want to be visible.
author: Diablo Cody

text: There can never be such a thing as a free market, because it is human nature to cheat, monopolize, and buy off others so as to corner the market.
author: Jane Smiley
